import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-oque-faco', templateUrl: './oque-faco.component.html', styleUrls: ['./oque-faco.component.css'] }) export class OQueFacoComponent { }

My Work

I am currently managing the process of migrating the entire IT infrastructure to the M365 platform and also to a global Active Directory.

I work daily with various platforms, including NetBox, Fortinet, Zimbra Mail Client, Nextcloud, Check Point and Rundeck, as well as various operating systems, such as Windows, Linux and MacOS.
